data.text: @snarkyblackgurl “Covid misinformation” girl get real, the CDC and the US government have been giving out misinformation since the beginning. #WakeUp

@snarkyblackgurl If this is what offends you in current events your priorities are whacked as fuck. Grow up, gain a sense or humor, and stop being an egomaniac. You’re feelings aren’t the end all be all.

That’s $10,000,000 per year… lost to a few laughs and a Chingy meme.
•
It seems that this black history month has been a true testament of the old negro spiritual that goes: “fuck around and find out.” All jokes aside white American, please do better than John Dempsey has. ✨💋

Instead of apologizing John should have just come out with a reel rapping ‘Right thurr’ while doing the chicken head in solidarity with the people, and maybe he could have kept his extremely substantial salary. According to reports, Dempsey’s lost a breathtaking $10,000,000. ✨💋

If I were Chingy I would monitor the potential damage this type of false claim has caused his brand since he is a working artist — and to have his name cross referenced with COVID misinformation could damage his potential to further book paid engagements, affecting his coin. ✨💋

Sources claim Estée Lauder is making it a requirement in the upcoming weeks to address all team questions relating to the current faux pas. I’m also sure they’ll be updating their social media policy to create a clause that address COVID misinformation, and — sighs — Chingy. ✨💋
